    • Method Detail

      • insertNewGame

        public void insertNewGame(IGame game)
        Write a new game to a dataFile. Extracts the gameId from the game and saves the game in the following format: filename: games/gameId.dat serializedGameData
        Parameters:
        game - the game to insert

      • updateGame

        public void updateGame(IGame game)
        Updates the saved game. Extracts the gameId, searches for the matching dataFile and overwrites the data in file with the new serialized game.
        Parameters:
        game - the game to update

      • deleteGameById

        public void deleteGameById(Integer gameId)
        Delete game by id.
        Parameters:
        gameId - the game id to delete

      • getAllGames

        public List<IGame> getAllGames()
        Gets the all games found in the dataFiles
        Returns:
        List of all games found.
